description:
Your simple video editor for creating wow videos

Your simple video editor for creating wow videos
- Easily create clips for your socials, business, or family
- Boost your videos with one-click auto subtitles and other AI tools
- Choose from hundreds of titles, transitions, and music tracks
- Pre-trim your videos before they ever hit the timeline with quick fragment selection. Drop the exact part you need instead of the whole file, keeping your project clean and saving time so you can get straight to editing.
- Level up your animation with the new expanded motion controls. Now you can precisely adjust movement with curves, making it look more fluid and dynamic.
